title: 4 of the Slum Act, to qualify as slum area and/or required for implementation of any slum rehabilitation project
clause_text: 4 of the Slum Act, to qualify as slum area and/or required for implementation of any slum rehabilitation project. Any area where a project under Slum Rehabilitation Scheme (SRS) has been approved by CEO, SRA shall be a deemed slum rehabilitation area.
section: Definition of Slum, Pavement, and Structure of hut:
